combinations.look: He looks focused.
combinations.talk: [if (item fuck) or (item realfuck)] Thank you for the painting! > [if (item fuck) or (item realfuck)][talk other][skip] A pleasure! > [if alias viktor][conversation klimt viktor_first] > [if alias matilda][conversation klimt matilda]

combinations.keys: [talk other] No, I use a brush to paint.

combinations.dress: [talk other] I don't do textile painting.
combinations.pants: [talk other] I don't do textile painting.
combinations.flaskempty: [talk other] I love absynthe. > [talk other] Too bad it's empty.

combinations.cell: [talk other] I'm no electrician...
combinations.cash: Why would I give him money? > [talk other] Why wouldn't you?

combinations.look: [set map1 1] My homeland! Basically, a bunch of countries that hate each other connected into an industrial hell.
[set map2 1] Magical ice kingdom of goblins faeries and butt trolls.
[set map3 1] A rainy tea-obsessed reinessance getting rich on it's mining colonies around the world.
[set map4 1] No need for a fridge here. Cold hearts of horned vikings are enough to keep anything frozen.
[set map5 1] Liberté, égalité, fraternité ou la mort! I don't know what that means, but they love their guillotines.
[set map6 1] In their god and king you trust or you die in the bull-fighting ring. Olé!
[set map7 1] Philosophical wonderland ruled by a facist mafia where you act like a Roman or get barbecued like a barbarian.
[set map8 1] A democratic heaven full of great inventions, beautiful art and an eternal financial debt
[set map8 1] What do you call a Blind German? : a Not see. Hahahahaha.
[set map9 1] Highly advanced culture of oil-drinking mutants. In money they trust, but they bomb you for free.
[set map10 1] Revolutionary gangs fighting each other while surviving on beans, beer and selling illegal plantlife to Texas.
[set map11 1] Enjoy the beautiful tourist heaven until you get robbed by multiple pirate gangs at once.
[set map12 1] Land of bees and cannibals feeding on each other through sacrifices.
[set map13 1] Like Mayana, but with alpacas instead of bees.
[set map14 1] Land of soccer players with big butts. Their rulership is chosen each year through a huge soccer tournament.
[set map15 1] A sad colony forced to love Asspain
[set map16 1] A giant icy prison system connected by trains that run on vodka. Zdravstvuj!
[set map17 1] Land of eternal riches and brutal slavery run by an evil parkour-loving prince.
[set map18 1] A wonderful place to visit if you want to run away from everything and everyone.
[set map19 1] World's biggest exporter of curry, spiritualists and new languages.
[set map20 1] They say that north Khmer is the best Khmer.
[set map21 1] Not really a country, but an industrial corporation that exports cheap gadgets and imports oxygen.
[set map22 1] Tecnology-obsessed shogunat full of extremely fat gladiators and extremely thin girls.
[set map23 1] A land of buddhist monks who refuse to fight the colonists from Unwanted Kingdom.
[set map24 1] Tourist heaven. Literally. No tourist ever came back from there.
[set map25 1] Name is self-explanatory.
[set map26 1] Nothing there but insane monsters that turn into tornados.
[set map27 1] Sheep, depression, hobbit holes and giant stone heads.
[set map28 1] Self proclaimed gods ruling from their giant pyramid tombs and making people build more pyramids.
[set map29 1] Once a proud nation of tribes ruled by voodoo shamans, now a property of Unwanted Kingdom.
[set map30 1] Dark jungles with mystical tribes, diamond mines and an occasional dinosaur
[set map31 1] I got a letter from their prince recently, but with a wrong return address... It's a long story.
[set map32 1] A desert kingdom, currently in war with... Texas, I think. Or was it Unwanted Kingdom?
[set map33 1] Land of extreme poverty and hunger. Most European countries send armies to battle it's hunger.
[set map34 1] I started avoiding all news about it ever since I heard that their insects are bigger then people.
[set map35 1] Land inhabited by really strange animals, plants and Frenchmen.
[set map36 1] They named it French Africa, then African France, then Frafrica... Eventually, they settled on this.
[set map37 1] UK's prisoner colony where everything is upside down and full of giant spiders.
[set map38 1] Something burned a hole on my map. Oh well, there's probably nothing important here..
